snippet: Rutgers’s incoming athletic director, Julie Hermann, said the problems she encountered as a women’s volleyball coach at Tennessee are part of the reason she is a good fit as a sports administrator.
abstract: Julie Hermann, incoming athletic director for Rutgers, says she learned from the problems she encountered as women's volleyball coach at Tennessee, making her a good fit as a sports administrator.
lead_paragraph: Rutgers’s incoming athletic director, Julie Hermann, said the problems she encountered as a women’s volleyball coach at Tennessee are part of the reason she is a good fit as a sports administrator.
